title: Dr. Disrespect's Game Studio Cuts Ties With Star - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.25.24
description:
Go to kindafunny.com/store to get our limited time Pride Collection! A portion of the sales will be donated to Queer LifeSpace and Denver based Center on Colfax!

Woof. What a day. Let's break it all down with Greg and Blessing and talk about Dr. Disrespect, Midnight Society, cancel culture and everything.
